column5: This is worse than getting caught by a conservation officer!  The One That Got Away
Or maybe my work has it blocked
The link worked fine for me....so maybe it is your work?  Sad tale there Jet, but I guess rules are rules.
Must be great site if your work is blocking it!  Try this one: http://www.factsoffishing.com/blog/dave-mercer/a-fish-worth-1-2-million/  The original link however has more story to it.
that would be sooo disappointing ... but yeah, rules are rules ... if it were me, I'd be a very sad individual...lol.
Yeah, I agree with the tournament decision completely.  Follow the rules, buy your licenses, and there are no problems.
the 2nd link wiorked, thanks jet good read. that sucked for them lol
read this the other day, its a crappy circumstance but thats the rules.
